messages.content: I want to learn about how the LinkedIn algorithm works. What kinds of posts get better reach, the writing style, and any other specifics which I can optimize for my post. Be very comprehensive, the writing style, the length, the attachments, the time at which the post is posted, the tone of the post, time gaps between posts, look into absolutely everything. I want to be able to optimize my posts for the best reach while ensuring it is getting to the right audience (recruiters) and is appealing to them.

<research_plan>
  <title>Research Plan for Optimizing LinkedIn Posts for Recruiter Reach</title>
  <step>
    <goal>Understand the core mechanisms of LinkedIn's algorithm that determine post distribution and reach.</goal>
    <description>Identify how LinkedIn ranks and surfaces content.</description>
    <query>How does LinkedIn's algorithm determine post reach and distribution 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Determine which content formats achieve the highest organic reach on LinkedIn.</goal>
    <description>Compare performance of text, image, video, carousel, and document posts.</description>
    <query>Which content formats perform best in terms of reach on LinkedIn 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Find the optimal length and writing style for posts that attract recruiter engagement.</goal>
    <description>Analyze word count, tone, structure, and readability.</description>
    <query>Ideal length and writing style for LinkedIn posts to maximize engagement 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Identify the best days and times to post, as well as recommended posting frequency for recruiter visibility.</goal>
    <description>Study time‑zone considerations and gaps between posts.</description>
    <query>Best posting times and frequency for LinkedIn content targeting recruiters 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Learn the effective use of hashtags and mentions to boost discoverability.</goal>
    <description>Determine optimal number and placement.</description>
    <query>How many hashtags and mentions should be used in LinkedIn posts for maximum reach 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Assess the impact of various attachments (links, PDFs, videos, images) on post performance.</goal>
    <description>Evaluate which media types drive higher reach and engagement.</description>
    <query>Impact of attachments (links, PDFs, videos) on LinkedIn post performance 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Explore strategies to specifically target and reach recruiters through LinkedIn's algorithmic personalization.</goal>
    <description>Leverage audience targeting features and network signals.</description>
    <query>How to target recruiters specifically on LinkedIn using algorithmic personalization 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Identify engagement tactics and promotion methods that increase post reach to the desired audience.</goal>
    <description>Include commenting, messaging, boosting, and analytics monitoring.</description>
    <query>Effective engagement tactics and post‑promotion methods to increase reach to recruiters on LinkedIn 2024</query>
  </step>
</research_plan>

approved_plan:
<title>Research Plan for Optimizing LinkedIn Posts for Recruiter Reach</title>
  <step>
    <goal>Understand the core mechanisms of LinkedIn's algorithm that determine post distribution and reach.</goal>
    <description>Identify how LinkedIn ranks and surfaces content.</description>
    <query>How does LinkedIn's algorithm determine post reach and distribution 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Determine which content formats achieve the highest organic reach on LinkedIn.</goal>
    <description>Compare performance of text, image, video, carousel, and document posts.</description>
    <query>Which content formats perform best in terms of reach on LinkedIn 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Find the optimal length and writing style for posts that attract recruiter engagement.</goal>
    <description>Analyze word count, tone, structure, and readability.</description>
    <query>Ideal length and writing style for LinkedIn posts to maximize engagement 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Identify the best days and times to post, as well as recommended posting frequency for recruiter visibility.</goal>
    <description>Study time‑zone considerations and gaps between posts.</description>
    <query>Best posting times and frequency for LinkedIn content targeting recruiters 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Learn the effective use of hashtags and mentions to boost discoverability.</goal>
    <description>Determine optimal number and placement.</description>

  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Assess the impact of various attachments (links, PDFs, videos, images) on post performance.</goal>
    <description>Evaluate which media types drive higher reach and engagement.</description>
    <query>Impact of attachments (links, PDFs, videos) on LinkedIn post performance 2024</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Explore strategies to specifically target and reach recruiters through LinkedIn's algorithmic personalization.</goal>

  <step>
